name: Caipirinha
description: Think of the caipirinha as the daiquiri's Brazilian cousin.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 of a fresh lime, cut into quarters
1 to 2 teaspoon superfine sugar, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lime pieces and sugar in the cocktail shaker and crush with the muddler. Add cachaça and a handful of ice; shake well and pour, unstrained, into a rocks or old fashioned glass.
